species.name: pheromosa
descriptions: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.

abilities.name: beast-boost
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
